lead_paragraph: Police in Florence say a bomb squad officer lost an eye and had to have a hand amputated after a suspicious package he was examining exploded before dawn Sunday.
snippet: Police in Florence say a bomb squad officer lost an eye and had to have a hand amputated after a suspicious package he was examining exploded before dawn Sunday....

headline.main: Italy Bomb Squad Expert Loses Eye, Hand to Exploding Package
headline.print_headline: Italy Bomb Squad Expert Loses Eye, Hand to Exploding Package
